dmca.title: NetResult DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
NetResult Internal Reference:   CaseID-138031

Please quote the above  CaseID-138031 reference in all communications with
us regarding this issue.

Audio Visual Infringement

Dear Sirs,

We have noticed that your Web Site,
http://depplustv1.blogspot.co.uk/p/canal-2.html is displaying Roland Garros
audiovisual (A/V) content.
All copyright in Roland Garros A/V content is exclusively owned by The
Federation Francaise de Tennis (FFT) and or its exclusive production
partners.  As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from (FFT) to
use this content, your present use is an infringement of The FFT's rights. 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web
sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

Please confirm immediately, by return, your undertaking to cease all such
infringements on any and all of your web sites.  

Formal Declaration

I hereby state that the FFT are the owner of the exclusive rights referenced
above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf with respect to
internet monitoring and compliance. 

On behalf of the FFT, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that
use of the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by the FFT,
its agents, or the law.

[I, [redacted], as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United
States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury
that the information in the notice is accurate.]

Please note that nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to
constitute an express or implied waiver of any of The FFT's rights or
remedies, all of which are expressly reserved.

We thank you for your cooperation.

Yours faithfully, 

[redacted]

NetResult Solutions Limited
[redacted]
London
SW15 9DT
United Kingdom

Tel: +44 (0)20 8246 4131

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please 
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail 
immediately to the correct person or department for action.

This email and any attachments thereto may contain private, 
confidential, and privileged material for the sole use of the individual 
or entity to whom they are addressed. If you are not the intended 
recipient, be advised that you have received this email in error and 
that any use, dissemination, forwarding, printing or copying of this 
email is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in 
error, please immediately return this by e-mail and then delete it.

Although this email message has been scanned for the presence of 
computer viruses, the sender accepts no liability for any damage 
sustained as a result of a computer virus and it is the recipient's 
responsibility to ensure that this email is virus free.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
